fields.name: files
fields.label: Add a video
fields.description: Click below to add a video you wish to use in your interactive video. You can add a video link or upload video files. It is possible to add several versions of the video with different qualities. To ensure maximum support in browsers at least add a version in webm and mp4 formats.

fields.name: startScreenOptions
fields.label: Start screen options (unsupported for YouTube videos)

fields.name: title
fields.label: The title of this interactive video
fields.description: Used in summaries, statistics etc.

fields.name: hideStartTitle
fields.label: Hide title on video start screen

fields.name: shortStartDescription
fields.label: Short description (Optional)
fields.description: Optional. Display a short description text on the video start screen. Does not work for YouTube videos.

fields.name: poster
fields.label: Poster image
fields.description: Image displayed before the user launches the video. Does not work for YouTube Videos.

fields.name: copyright
fields.label: Video copyright information
fields.description: Information regarding copyright of the video and elements used in the video.

fields.name: label
fields.label: Track label
fields.description: Used if you offer multiple tracks and the user has to choose a track. For instance 'Spanish subtitles' could be the label of a Spanish subtitle track.

fields.name: srcLang
fields.label: Source language, must be defined for subtitles
fields.description: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If 'Subtitles' is the type of text track selected, the source language of the track must be defined.

fields.name: displayType
fields.label: Display as
fields.description: Button is a collapsed interaction the user must press to open. Poster is an expanded interaction displayed directly on top of the video

fields.name: buttonOnMobile
fields.label: Turn into button on small screens

fields.name: label
fields.label: Label
fields.description: Label displayed next to interaction icon.

fields.name: seekTo
fields.label: Seek to
fields.description: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.name: allowOptOut
fields.label: Allow the user to opt out and continue

fields.name: seekTo
fields.label: Seek to
fields.description: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.name: allowOptOut
fields.label: Allow the user to opt out and continue

fields.name: requireCompletion
fields.label: Require full score for task before proceeding
fields.description: For best functionality this option should be used in conjunction with the "Prevent skipping forward in a video" option of Interactive Video.

fields.name: boxShadow
fields.label: Box shadow
fields.description: Adds a subtle shadow around the interaction. You might want to disable this for completely transparent interactions

fields.name: time
fields.label: Go To
fields.description: The target time the user will be taken to upon pressing the hotspot. Enter timecode in the format M:SS.

fields.name: visualize
fields.label: Visualize
fields.description: Show that interaction can be clicked by adding a border and an icon

fields.name: displayAt
fields.label: Display at
fields.description: Number of seconds before the video ends.

fields.name: startVideoAt
fields.label: Start video at
fields.description: Enter timecode in the format M:SS

fields.name: autoplay
fields.label: Auto-play video
fields.description: Start playing the video automatically

fields.name: loop
fields.label: Loop the video
fields.description: Check if video should run in a loop

fields.name: showSolutionButton
fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.name: retryButton
fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.name: showBookmarksmenuOnLoad
fields.label: Start with bookmarks menu open
fields.description: This function is not available on iPad when using YouTube as video source.

fields.name: preventSkipping
fields.label: Prevent skipping forward in a video
fields.description: Enabling this options will disable user video navigation through default controls.

fields.name: deactivateSound
fields.label: Deactivate sound
fields.description: Enabling this option will deactivate the video's sound and prevent it from being switched on.

fields.name: defaultAdaptivitySeekLabel
fields.label: Default label for adaptivity seek button

fields.name: continueWithVideo
fields.label: Default label for continue video button

fields.name: requiresCompletionWarning
fields.label: Warning that the user must answer the question correctly before continuing
fields.default: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.

fields.name: navigationHotkeyInstructions
fields.label: Text for explaining navigation hotkey
fields.default: Use key k for starting and stopping video at any time

fields.name: singleInteractionAnnouncement
fields.label: Text explaining that a single interaction with a name has come into view

fields.name: multipleInteractionsAnnouncement
fields.label: Text for explaining that multiple interactions have come into view

fields.name: answered
fields.label: Answered message (@answered will be replaced with the number of answered questions)

fields.name: endcardTitle
fields.label: Submit screen title
fields.description: @answered will be replaced by the number of answered questions.

fields.name: endcardInformation
fields.label: Submit screen information
fields.default: You have answered @answered questions, click below to submit your answers.
fields.description: @answered will be replaced by the number of answered questions.

fields.name: endcardInformationNoAnswers
fields.label: Submit screen information for missing answers
fields.default: You have not answered any questions.

fields.name: endcardInformationMustHaveAnswer
fields.label: Submit screen information for answer needed
fields.default: You have to answer at least one question before you can submit your answers.

fields.name: endcardTableRowAnswered
fields.label: Submit screen table row title: Answered questions

fields.name: endcardTableRowScore
fields.label: Submit screen table row title: Score
